cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa

Class EsaGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.EsaGenerator

  • public class EsaGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that allows for passing from a text (collection) into its ESA vector representation.
    Since:
    Dec 17, 2013
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    albarron

      • setNormalisation

        public void setNormalisation(java.lang.Boolean norm)
        Determines whether the ESA vectors are going to be normalised.
        If true, the vectors are normalised by the maximum score in order to range the values in [0,1].
        Parameters:
        norm -
